entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 27 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 27 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
